@graph.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services
@graph.description: Turhan Corporate provides transparent pricing for consulting, residence permit applications, company formation, tourist guides, and translation services in Latvia.

@graph.name: Pricing for Services in Latvia
@graph.description: Transparent pricing for 2025 for services including general consulting, residence permit applications, company formation, tourist guides, and translation services in Latvia.

publisher.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Hourly consulting services for any questions or topics related to investment and business in Latvia.

offers.description: General consulting services charged per hour, allowing clients to discuss any investment or business-related topics.

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Comprehensive assistance with residence permit applications through investment, including document preparation and institutional visits.

offers.description: Services include document preparation, translation, consultancy, institutional visits, airport transfer, and minor institutional fees.

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Assistance with establishing a company in Latvia, including document preparation and registration.

offers.description: Includes document preparation, translation, consultancy, one-year company address, company seal/stamp, and minor institutional fees. Bank account opening not included.

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Multilingual guide services for tourists and delegations in Latvia and other European countries.

offers.description: Daily guide services in Turkish, Latvian, Russian, and English, covering Latvia, Lithuania, Estonia, and other European countries. Guide's accommodation and meals for multi-day programs are provided by the client.

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Professional written translation services in Turkish, Latvian, Russian, and English, per 400-word page.

offers.description: Written translations per 400-word page, signed by the translator, with optional notary or apostille certification for additional fees. Includes VAT and invoice.

provider.name: Turhan Corporate, Business and Investment Services

@graph.description: Professional verbal translation services in Turkish, Latvian, Russian, and English, charged per hour.

offers.description: Hourly verbal translation services, including local travel expenses for the translator, with VAT and invoice included.
